trans-unit.source: A service behavior that enables you to specify the action to take when an unhandled exception occurs within a workflow service.
trans-unit.target: Um comportamento de serviço que permite que você especifique a ação a ser executada quando ocorre uma exceção sem tratamento em um serviço de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> dictate the behavior of the runtime when an exception is not handled in the workflow; however, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> has the option of leaving a suspended workflow in the persistence store, while <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> does not.
trans-unit.target: Ambos <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> determinam o comportamento de tempo de execução quando uma exceção não é tratada no fluxo de trabalho; no entanto, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior> tem a opção de deixar um fluxo de trabalho no repositório de persistência, enquanto <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> não.

trans-unit.source: The reason for this is that what happens to a suspended workflow is host-specific, and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> is not.
trans-unit.target: A razão para isso é o que acontece com um fluxo de trabalho específico do host, e <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication> não é.

trans-unit.source: To implement this functionality using <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, create a custom <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> that has this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Para implementar essa funcionalidade usando <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication>, criar um personalizado <xref:System.Activities.Persistence.PersistenceParticipant> com esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this behavior see [Workflow Service Host Extensibility](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como usar esse comportamento, consulte [extensibilidade de Host do serviço de fluxo de trabalho](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/workflow-service-host-extensibility.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the action to take when an unhandled exception occurs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a ação a ser executada quando ocorre uma exceção sem tratamento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior.Action%2A> property can be set to one of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionBehavior.Action%2A> propriedade pode ser definida como uma da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowUnhandledExceptionAction> valores.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints exposed by the service.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de extremidade expostos pelo serviço.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters required to implement the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros de associação necessários para implementar o comportamento.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase,System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection)" /> para dar suporte ao comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> para dar suporte ao comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: O host de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementa o método <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDescription,System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase)" /> para dar suporte ao comportamento.
